resources.string: Here are the Tesla tokens generated by this app. You can copy them from here and use them into other third-party apps. Most of third-party apps will accept the Owner API Token as login mean.
You token has been emitted less than 1 day ago, refresh is not needed for now
When the Owner API token expires, you can renew it using the button above. A new token will then be generated and you can replace the old one in your third-party applications.
